channel.title: Request your sigs here. (Nothing too complicated please :P)
channel.description:
Hi. Request your signatures here. I Will work on them straight away since i have nothing else to do :P
I need to know:
Colours you want Image(s) to include (if you cant attatch one just say the sort of picture you want. EG a gun. The text for it to say
Possible: Basic idea of the look/layout
NOTE: All sigs will be 130x600.
